directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the flour, salt, celery salt, pepper, dry mustard, paprika, garlic powder, thyme, savory, ginger, basil and oregano. Keep mixture in an airtight container.
To use: Steam chicken until tender, dip pieces in beaten egg then roll in the spice mixture. Deep fry for 3 minutes on each side.
title: Spice Mix for Chicken
